name: Parkitect
summary: Parkitect is a construction and management simulation video game developed and published by Texel Raptor. After a successful Kickstarter campaign and a two year-long early access beta period, the game was released worldwide on November 29, 2018. Parkitect simulates amusement park management, similar to the RollerCoaster Tycoon series.
info:
• 中文名: 游乐园建造师
